scripts.reset-all: cd .. && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && cd example && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean-android: cd .. && npm run build && cd example && rm -rf android && EXPO_DEBUG=true npx expo prebuild --clean --platform android && npx expo run:android
scripts.clean-ios: cd .. && npm run build && cd example && rm -rf ios && EXPO_DEBUG=true npx expo prebuild --clean --platform ios && npx expo run:ios
scripts.eas-ios-local: rm -rf ios && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean && eas build --platform ios --local
scripts.eas-android-local: rm -rf android && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && eas build --platform android --local
